org.apereo.cas.logout

Class DefaultLogoutManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apereo.cas.logout.DefaultLogoutManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apereo.cas.logout.LogoutManager

    public class DefaultLogoutManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apereo.cas.logout.LogoutManager
    This logout manager handles the Single Log Out process.
    Since:
    4.0.0

        logoutMessageBuilder - the builder to construct logout messages.
